okgraph.task.set_expansion.centroid namespace¶

Submodules¶

okgraph.task.set_expansion.centroid.centroid module¶

okgraph.task.set_expansion.centroid.centroid.mean(vectors: [[<class 'float'>]])¶

Calculates the average vector from an array of numerical vectors. :param vectors: array of vectors :return: the average vector

okgraph.task.set_expansion.centroid.centroid.task(seed: [<class 'str'>], k: int, options: dict)¶

Finds words similar to the words in the seed (co-hyponyms). This task uses a “centroid” based method. The vector representation of the seed words are used to calculate their

average vector (centroid). The vector model is then used to find the closest words to the centroid.

Parameters

  • seed – list of words that has to be expanded

  • k – limit to the number of results in the set expansion

  • options – task options: “embeddings” is the words vector model (Magnitude)

Returns

the words closest to the centroid vector
